data.name: MANA Team
data.description: Mapping and Needs Assessment (MANA) team overseeing geospatial and socio-economic profiling.
data.mission: Deliver updated community baselines and data layers to guide OOBC interventions.
data.focus_areas: ["Community mapping refresh cycles", "Needs assessment data quality", "Field team readiness and logistics"]

data.name: M&E Unit
data.description: Monitoring and Evaluation unit tracking programme outcomes and implementation fidelity.
data.mission: Transform field reports into actionable insights for adaptive management and leadership decisions.
data.focus_areas: ["Indicator performance tracking", "Data validation and synthesis", "Reporting for management and partners"]

data.name: Planning and Budgeting Unit
data.description: Unit aligning programme priorities with financial planning and resource mobilisation.
data.mission: Translate community priorities into resourced plans and monitor execution timelines.
data.focus_areas: ["Quarterly budgeting cycles", "Resource alignment with MANA outputs", "Portfolio risk mitigation"]

data.name: Coordination Unit
data.description: Unit orchestrating cross-agency touchpoints and commitments for OOBC communities.
data.mission: Synchronise engagements with BARMM ministries, LGUs, and partners for cohesive delivery.

data.name: Community Development Unit
data.description: Unit crafting development packages and support services for OOBC communities.
data.mission: Co-design livelihood, protection, and social support interventions with communities.

data.name: Research Unit
data.description: Research hub documenting emerging issues, indigenous knowledge, and policy evidence.
data.mission: Convert field intelligence into briefs that feed policy and programme design.
